name: Paul Sauer 2015
description:
A great wine, with a distinguished track record in one of the best-ever Cape vintages: if any South African wine deserves 100 points, and I strongly believe that it does, then it is the brilliant 2015 Paul Sauer, one of the greatest young wines I have ever tasted.’  Tim Atkin SA Special Report 2018, 100/100
'Rightly regarded as SA ‘first growth’ Bordeaux blend, traditionally Cabernet-based with Merlot, Cabernet Franc; 70/15/15 in 2015 which, though less plush than 2014 in cooler summer, exudes a controlled opulence thanks to satisfying dry finish and firm tannic foundation for extended ageing.' - Platter's SA Wine Guide 2019, 5* (95/100)
